message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a fair split that accounts for the 10% inflation penalty you face per round. If we go to the next round, your money will be worth less. This offer gives you $450000 in real value now, which is better than waiting.
Hello Alice, I'm proposing an even split of the $1000000. This is a fair division for both of us. Let's agree on this and conclude the game with equal shares.

Bob, by now you've seen how inflation affects your position. If we go to round 4, your money will be worth 30% less than in round 1. My offer gives you $400000 in real value now, which is better than waiting further. This is a rational division given the asymmetric inflation.
